      • getInstance

        public static ClientFacade getInstance()
        Singleton Pattern to have a single instance of the Facade, since it contains the models.
        Returns:
        the static instance of the Client Facade.

        Parameters:

        Determines if the player can buy a dev card.
        Returns:
        whether or not the player can buy a dev card.

      • buyDevCard

        public void buyDevCard()
        Purchases a Development Card. This will take the card from the bank, and adds it to the player' hand.

      • playMonopolyCard

        public void playMonopolyCard(ResourceType resource)
        Plays a Monopoly Card.
        Parameters:
        resource - the type of resource the player is getting the monopoly on.

        Plays a Year of Plenty Card.
        Parameters:
        resource1 - The first resource.
        resource2 - The second resource.

      • canPlaceRoad

        public boolean canPlaceRoad(EdgeLocation edgeLoc)
        Checks to see if the player meets the conditions to place a road
        Parameters:
        edgeLoc - the location of the Road
        Returns:
        boolean - true if the player has the required resources and the location is vacant and the player owns a settlement or city at a neighboring vertex location
        Pre-Conditions:
        place road is called
        Post-Conditions:
        place road continues

      • canPlaceSettlement

        public boolean canPlaceSettlement(VertexLocation vertLoc)
        Checks to see if the player meets the condition to place a settlement
        Parameters:
        vertLoc - the location of the Vertex
        Returns:
        boolean - true if player has the required resources and the location is 2 edges or more from another settlement
        Pre-Conditions:
        place settlement is called
        Post-Conditions:
        place settlement continues

      • canPlaceCity

        public boolean canPlaceCity(VertexLocation vertLoc)
        Checks to see if the player meets the condition to place a city
        Parameters:
        vertLoc - the location of the Vertex
        Returns:
        boolean - true if player has the required resources and the player owns the settlement at that location
        Pre-Conditions:
        place city is called
        Post-Conditions:
        place city continues

      • canPlaceRobber

        public boolean canPlaceRobber(HexLocation hexLoc)
        Checks to see if player meets the condition to move the robber
        Parameters:
        hexLoc - the location of the hex
        Returns:
        true if a seven has been rolled and the location is viable
        Pre-Conditions:
        place robber is called
        Post-Conditions:
        place city continues

      • placeRoad

        public void placeRoad(EdgeLocation edgeLoc)
        Player purchases and places a road
        Parameters:
        edgeLoc - the location of the road
        Pre-Conditions:
        player clicks on a location to place road
        Post-Conditions:
        player met conditions and road is on map

      • placeSettlement

        public void placeSettlement(VertexLocation vertLoc)
        Player purchases and places a settlement
        Parameters:
        vertLoc - the location of the Settlement
        Pre-Conditions:
        player clicks on a location to place a settlement
        Post-Conditions:
        player met conditions and settlement is now on map

      • placeCity

        public void placeCity(VertexLocation vertLoc)
        Player purchases and places a city at a location specified
        Parameters:
        vertLoc - the location of the City
        Pre-Conditions:
        player clicks to build on a location
        Post-Conditions:
        a city is now owned by the player

      • placeRobber

        public void placeRobber(HexLocation hexLoc)
        Changes the Robbers HexLocation
        Parameters:
        hexLoc - the location of the Robber
        Pre-Conditions:
        player rolls a 7
        Post-Conditions:
        player robs player

      • robPlayer

        public void robPlayer(RobPlayerInfo victim)
        Robs a player, player receives one resource from the player being robbed
        Parameters:
        victim - the victim of the brutal armed robbery
        Pre-Conditions:
        robber is placed
        Post-Conditions:
        player has an extra resource

        Post-Conditions:
